headline: Exclusive-Financial software provider OneStream explores sale after share price drop, sources say
summary: (Reuters) -Financial software maker OneStream is exploring strategic options including a possible sale, less than 18 months after its ​stock market debut, according to three people familiar with the matter.  OneStream has been working with investment ‌bankers at JPMorgan Chase on its options, the sources said, noting that deliberations are at an early stage and there is no ‌guarantee of any transaction involving the company.  Private equity firms including Blackstone and Hg are among the names that the sources said have been studying possible bids for OneStream in recent weeks.
